attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Britian have been refuseing to get involved with this civil war in israel, the party's are saying that nothing could be done, what i dont understand is how do you no, this is a act of ignorance against a huge issue of genoside in 1944 the americans refused to get involved with the germans commiting genoside against the race of jews and look what happend.. yet another world war and the was due to ignorance, maybe if they had got involved something may have been done. we need to get over there and help as we can, we are a first world country and have the science and knowledge to beable to do that

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
